Hi,
 
Can anyone assist me with this Wakizashi? I'm after more information on the
style and school of the mounts. I was told that due to the style of the
mounts it would have been a merchants or high class civilian's sword. Can
anyone confirm or deny this?
The grove cut into the saya does look to be a kind of fashion statement. The
blade is out of polish but looks to have a gunome hamon.
 
http://www.c.farrar.btinternet.co.uk/wak/
 
Thanks for any assistance anyone can offer!
 
Peter
